description: Harvard University on Friday sued the US administration against its decision to revoke its eligibility to enrol international students, in an escalation of the fight between President Donald Trump and the prestigious university.
titles: "Harvard Takes on Trump: Prestigious Uni Sues Gov't Over International Student Ban!"
"Uni vs President: Harvard Fights Back Against Trump's Student Visa Crackdown!"
"Harvard Showdown: Elite Uni Refuses to Back Down on International Student Rights!"
"Academic Freedom Under Fire: Harvard Sues Trump Admin Over Student Visa Decision!"
